com.garygregory.jcommander.converters

Class AbstractBaseConverter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.beust.jcommander.converters.BaseConverter<T>
      • com.garygregory.jcommander.converters.AbstractBaseConverter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the target type of the conversion.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.beust.jcommander.IStringConverter<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlgorithmParameterGeneratorConverter, AlgorithmParametersConverter, AllInetAddressesNameConverter, BigDecimalConverter, BigIntegerConverter, ByteOrderConverter, CertificateFactoryConverter, CertPathValidatorConverter, CharsetConverter, CipherConverter, ClassConverter, ConnectionConverter, CurrencyConverter, DateConverter, DriverConverter, DurationConverter, DurationConverter, ExemptionMechanismConverter, InetAddressNameConverter, InstantConverter, KeyAgreementConverter, KeyFactoryConverter, KeyGeneratorConverter, KeyManagerFactoryConverter, KeyPairGeneratorConverter, KeyStoreConverter, LocalDateConverter, LocalDateTimeConverter, LocaleConverter, LocalTimeConverter, MacConverter, MessageDigestConverter, MicrosoftTypesConverter, MonthDayConverter, MysqlTypesConverter, NetworkInterfaceIndexConverter, NetworkInterfaceNameConverter, OffsetDateTimeConverter, OffsetTimeConverter, OracleTypesConverter, PeriodConverter, PosixFilePermissionSetConverter, ProviderConverter, QNameConverter, SecretKeyFactoryConverter, SecureRandomConverter, SignatureConverter, TimeConverter, TimestampConverter, TimeZoneConverter, TrustManagerFactoryConverter, TypesConverter, URIConverter, URLConverter, UUIDConverter, YearConverter, YearMonthConverter, ZonedDateTimeConverter, ZoneIdConverter, ZoneOffsetConverter

    public abstract class AbstractBaseConverter<T>
extends com.beust.jcommander.converters.BaseConverter<T>
    Provides common services for converters in this package
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Gary Gregory

      • AbstractBaseConverter

        public AbstractBaseConverter(String optionName,
                             Class<T> targetClass,
                             boolean failOnNull)
        Constructs a new instance for the given option, target class and fail-on-null.
        Parameters:
        optionName - may be null
        targetClass - must not be null
        failOnNull - if true, the converter fails when the conversion results in a null value

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        public T convert(String value)
        Converts the given value or throws a ParameterException. Delegates the actual conversion to subclasses with convertImpl(String).
        Parameters:
        value - the value to convert.
        Throws:
        com.beust.jcommander.ParameterException - for a conversion problem

                          throws Exception
        Converts a value.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to convert
        Returns:
        the converted value
        Throws:
        Exception - subclasses can throw any Exception
